publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2902 Ms Margo MacDonald: UN Resolution on State of Palestine-That the Parliament agrees with Rabbi Pete Tobias in criticising the lack of humanity and purpose in the bloody and brutal policies of Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon towards the Palestinian people; thanks him for his honesty and courage, and notes the UN resolution commending the establishment of an independent state of Palestine existing peacefully side-by-side with the state of Israel.
S1M-2902 UN Resolution on State of Palestine (lodged on 13 March 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr John McAllion*, Linda Fabiani*, Cathy Peattie*

S1M-2902 Ms Margo MacDonald: UN Resolution on State of Palestineâ€”That the Parliament agrees with Rabbi Pete Tobias in criticising the lack of humanity and purpose in the bloody and brutal policies of Israeli Prime Minister Ariel Sharon towards the Palestinian people; thanks him for his honesty and courage, and notes the UN resolution commending the establishment of an independent state of Palestine existing peacefully side-by-side with the state of Israel. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Tommy Sheridan, Mr John McAllion, Linda Fabiani, Cathy Peattie, Dennis Canavan*
S1M-2902 UN Resolution on State of Palestine (lodged on 13 March 2002) Robin Harper*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2902 UN Resolution on State of Palestine (lodged on 13 March 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Alex Neil*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-2902 UN Resolution on State of Palestine (lodged on 13 March 2002) Michael Russell*
S1M-2902 UN Resolution on State of Palestine (lodged on 13 March 2002) Pauline McNeill*
S1M-2902 UN Resolution on State of Palestine (lodged on 13 March 2002) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-2902 UN Resolution on State of Palestine (lodged on 13 March 2002) Elaine Smith*, Susan Deacon*
S1M-2902 UN Resolution on State of Palestine (lodged on 13 March 2002) Bill Butler*
